attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give a knighthood to Bruce Forsyth for his many years work on television as a comedian, presenter and all round entertainer. Particularly noting that his perfomances were always clean and he has never used bad language or blasphemy

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
